quotes.text: What do you call it when your sister refuses to lower the moon?   Lunacy.
quotes.author: Akaraah

quotes.text: Where was Rainbow Dash when she fell in love?    On cloud nine.
quotes.author: Tyroq

quotes.text: How do unicorns signal impatience with slow ponies in front of them?      They honk their horns.
quotes.author: Tyroq

quotes.text: How powerful was the engine of the train to Appleoosa?     Looked like about six horse power to me..
quotes.author: Tyroq

quotes.text: What do you call Apple Bloom, Sweetie Belle, and Scootaloo when they're depressed?     The Moody Dark Crusaders.
quotes.author: Doctor XFizzle

quotes.text: Fluttershy's pet rabbit Angel is rather unique. Which makes me wonder, How do you catch a unique rabbit?       Unique up on it of course!
quotes.author: Tyroq

quotes.text: why do ponies have such big nostrils?          Because they have hooves! You try picking your nose without fingers, see how easy that is...
quotes.author: Tyroq

quotes.text: What do you call it when a unicorn studies fashion?     I don't know, but it sure is a rarity.
quotes.author: Akaraah
